title: Three popular stock indices for tracking the performance of the U.S. market are the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA), the Standard & Poor’s 500 (S&P 500) Index, and the NASDAQ Composite Index. The DJIA is an index that tracks 30 large

note: market. The NASDAQ Composite Index is an index of equities listed on NASDAQ.
title: These stocks constitute about 25 percent of the total value of the U.S
Another market indicator is the S&P 500 Index, which comprises 500 of the largest companies in the U.S
